metadata.title: CVE-2022-23318 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-buffer-overflow in pcf2bdf, versions >= 1.05 allows an attacker to trigger unsafe memory access via a specially crafted PCF font file. This out-of-bound read may lead to an application crash, information disclosure via program memory or other context-dependent impact.

criterions.comment: pcf2bdf package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
